dmca.title: DMCA Complaints
dmca.body:
FROM : [private] HOLISTIC CENTER F NO. :[private] Oct. 05 200? 04: 52PM P1 
[private]
.,c 
ce:e fl#iV:_(o1Lyq/5cq,,#9AcA 
Sat Yuua Press <p$satYu.coflP C;. -- J , Sun, Sep 30, 2007 at 11:61 AM 
DMCA 
Dear Google/Blogspot 
1. You have several blogspot sites illegally offering free downloads of my book and ebook, Ayurveda 
Encyclopedia. I am the author and sole copyright holder, 
The Ayurveda Encyclopedia is a reference book first published in 1988 with 2nd edition in 2007. It is available as book and ebook and I have given full distribution rights to one company to sell the book and ebook. No one anywhere has any permission to give the book or ebook away free online or anywhere else. 
2. Illegal pages offering free downloads of my book on your site to date include: 
a) [private]
b) htto://essentialwarez.bicxispoLcom)20O7/09/ayurveda-encyclopedip-naturl-se.rej.htmi C) http://leechme.blopspot.comI2QQ7/Q9lbooks-avurveda-encvclopedia-naturablilml 
some sites say they do not host the ebook so imply they are doing nothing illegal. Perhaps you can search your blogspot sites for anyone linking to the following illegal hosting sites: 
www.dl4all.com 
h1tp://rapidar.corn/filesJ1950.
